mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, show_yn, secret_yn, password, writer, register_date, reply_yn) values (seq_board.nextval , #{title}, #{content}, #{showYn}, #{secretYn}, #{password}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, #{replyYn} )
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, secret_yn = #{secretYn}, password = #{password} where bno = #{bno}
